name: Events
description: Display holiday event images and QR codes based on active events

config.title: Events Settings
config.description: Configure recurring holiday events (e.g., Halloween, Christmas) with custom greetings and images. Date format: MM-DD (e.g., 10-31 for October 31st).

itemFields.label: Start Date (MM-DD)
itemFields.description: Event start date in MM-DD format

itemFields.label: End Date (MM-DD)
itemFields.description: Event end date in MM-DD format

itemFields.label: Image Name
itemFields.description: Image filename in src/components/events/assets/ (without .png extension, e.g., halloween)

itemFields.label: QR Code Link
itemFields.description: URL or text to encode in QR code (e.g., https://example.com or WiFi connection string)

itemFields.label: Custom Greeting
itemFields.description: Custom greeting message for this event
